body.p: Fleming County, Kentucky, sheriff. Fleminsgburg, Kentucky, native. Married Juliet E. Dorsey Botts. Father of Mary W. Botts Read, Anny Botts Smith, Seth Botts, Amelia Botts Wright, George W. Botts, and Juliet E. Botts Ray. Farmer in Fleming County in 1860. Sheriff of Fleming County in 1862.
